General.Name: Bank of Nanjing Co Ltd
General.Description: Bank of Nanjing Co., Ltd. provides various financial products and services in China. It operates through Corporate Banking, Personal Banking, Treasury Operation, and Other Business segments. The company offers loans, bill issuance, trade financing, corporate deposits, saving deposits, credit cards and remittance services for corporate and private customers. It also provides fund and trust plan investment, asset management, bond investment, repurchase and resale, and interbank lending business services, etc. Bank of Nanjing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Xuanjie  Yu
1.Title: Chief Information Officer & GM of Information Technology Dept.
